crops.name: Broad Bean (Aquadulce/Hardy)
crops.protection: Cloche/fleece in cold snaps; stake rows against wind
crops.tips: Pinch out tips at first sign of blackfly; support with string runs.
crops.notes: Autumn-sown plants crop earlier the following summer.

crops.name: Pea (Dwarf/Early)
crops.where: Beds, raised beds, troughs with low support
crops.protection: Net against birds and mice; slug control essential
crops.tips: Use twiggy sticks or 40–60cm mesh for support; keep evenly watered.
crops.notes: Dwarf types suit balconies and exposed sites.

crops.name: Pea (Mangetout/Sugar Snap)
crops.where: Beds, raised beds, containers with mesh/trellis
crops.protection: Netting against birds; copper tape for slugs in pots
crops.tips: Pick pods young and often to prolong cropping.

crops.name: French Bean (Dwarf/Bush)
crops.protection: Wait until soils are warm; fleece if nights <10°C
crops.tips: Mulch to keep moisture; pick regularly for continued yield.

crops.name: French Bean (Climbing)
crops.where: Beds, large containers with cane wigwams/trellis
crops.protection: Fleece on cold nights early on; wind protection
crops.tips: Train clockwise up canes; feed high potash once flowering.
crops.notes: Great vertical crop for small spaces.

crops.name: Runner Bean
crops.where: Beds, large containers with sturdy supports
crops.protection: Harden off well; fleece if temperatures dip
crops.tips: Keep roots moist; mulch; pick pods small to avoid stringiness.

crops.name: Broad Bean (Spring Varieties)
crops.protection: Stake in windy gardens; blackfly control by pinching tips
crops.tips: Early indoor sowings in modules reduce seed losses to mice.
